articles.title: National Meeting Marks 57th Anniversary of Victory in War
articles.content:
National Meeting Marks 57th Anniversary of Victory in War
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- A national meeting was held at the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium Monday to mark the 57th anniversary of the victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War. 
					 Present there were senior Party, army and state officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of party, armed forces and power organs, public organizations, ministries and national institutions, servicepersons of the Korean People's Army, those of the Korean People's  Interior Forces, officials in the fields of science, education, culture and arts, public health and media, war veterans, heroes and heroines, servicemen's families, those who performed merits in assisting the army, overseas Koreans staying in the socialist homeland and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 July 27, Juche 42 (1953) is the day of the victory the army and people of the DPRK won by defeating the U.S. imperialists in the three year-long hard-fought Fatherland Liberation War under the wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung. 
					
					 In this war they protected the independence of the country and the sovereignty of the nation from the imperialist allied forces' aggression, shattered the myth of "mightiness" of the U.S. imperialists, who boasted of being the "strongest" in the world, and brought the beginning of the downhill turn for them.
					
					 KPA Vice Marshal Kim Yong Chun, vice-chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and minister of the People's Armed Forces, said in a report delivered at the meeting that the victory in the war was a miracle recorded in the history of modern war, a product of the Juche-oriented military idea and strategy, matchless pluck and outstanding commanding art of the President.
					
					 Under the outstanding leadership of Kim Il Sung the Korean people won a shining victory in the war, honorably defending the glorious DPRK and the gains of the revolution, frustrating the moves of the U.S. imperialists for a new world war and protecting the security and peace of mankind, the reporter noted, and continued: 
					
					 The undying feats the President performed by winning the victory in the war and the ever-victorious tradition of heroic Korea have been steadfastly carried forward generation after generation under the outstanding Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 He made a scientific analysis of the international environment and the rapidly changing situation of the Korean revolution at a time when a stern ordeal befell the country and the nation. He, on this basis, enforced Songun politics in all fields on a new higher level, the politics which calls for giving priority to military affairs and regarding revolutionary armed forces as main forces, thereby providing a firm political and military guarantee for final victory in the confrontation with U.S. 
					
					 This great victory clearly testified to the fact that eternal are the ever- victorious history and tradition of the army and people of the DPRK who have Kim Jong Il at the helm of the Songun revolution and there is no force on earth that can overpower the might of the Korean people single-mindedly united around him. 
					
					 The U.S. should realize that its war of aggression like the Korean War started by it on June 25 is bound to end in the victory of Songun Korea just as it ended in the victory of the Korean people on July 27. 
					
					 The DPRK will further bolster its nuclear deterrence in a new advanced manner to cope with the increasing nuclear threat of the U.S.
					
					 This is a legitimate sovereign right of the DPRK and a mode of merciless counteraction of its revolutionary armed forces as they have always emerged victorious in the fight against the enemies by displaying the pluck and offensive spirit of Mt. Paektu. 
					
					 Should the U.S. imperialists and the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors finally ignite a new war of aggression in Korea despite the repeated warnings of the DPRK, it will mobilize the tremendous military potential including its nuclear deterrence for self-defence and thus wipe out the aggressors and blow up all their strongholds. By doing so it will clearly show what a real war will look like and completely eradicate the root cause of war.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Swedish Ambassador
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Swedish Ambassador
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with Swedish Ambassador to the DPRK Mats Foyer who paid a farewell call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Monday.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun Expresses Will to Boost Cooperative Relations with ASEAN
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun Expresses Will to Boost Cooperative Relations with ASEAN
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- The ASEAN took the first significant step forward in implementing the roadmap of building the community till 2015 and charter, DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun said this on July 23 in his speech at the ministerial meeting of the 17th ASEAN Regional Forum in Hanoi, Vietnam, He attended the forum heading the DPRK delegation.
					 Pak expressed hope that the ASEAN would make greater contributions to peace and development of Asia and the rest of the world in the future as influential forces standing for peace and development.
					
					 The volatile situation prevailing on the Korean Peninsula that has reached a war phase has not only put the sovereignty of the DPRK and the security of its people at peril but seriously hindered the building of an economic power, he said.
					
					 Peace has been preserved on the Korean Peninsula so far and this would have been unthinkable without the deep care and positive efforts exerted by the ASEAN, he noted, and went on:
					
					 The government of the DPRK would make efforts to conclude a peace treaty and realize denuclearization through the six-party talks on an equal footing for the present.
					
					 We regard it as a correct orientation to make efforts to resume the six-party talks on an equal footing, conclude a peace treaty on the Korean Peninsula and denuclearize it as it is in line with the ideal of ASEAN and the purport of the ARF for defending peace and security of Asia.
					
					 We are convinced that member states of the ARF would support and encourage the earlier resumption of the six-party talks with correct understanding of the DPRK's endeavors to settle the fundamental issue of a war or peace on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The government of the DPRK will further strengthen and develop the friendly and cooperative relations with the regional countries in the avowed idea of its foreign policy for independence, peace and friendship in the future, too and do its utmost to defend peace and security in the Korean Peninsula and the region.

articles.title: Chinese Assistant FM and Foreigner Here
articles.content:
Chinese Assistant FM and Foreigner Here
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- Hu Zhengyue, assistant to the foreign minister of China, and his party arrived here today.
					 Arriving also was a delegation of the Vietnam Farmers' Union led by Chairman of its Central Committee Nguyen Quoc Cuong.

articles.title: Letter from Military Attaches Corps
articles.content:
Letter from Military Attaches Corps
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a floral basket and a congratulatory letter from the military attaches corps here on the occasion of the 57th anniversary of the victorious Fatherland Liberation War. 
					 The basket and letter were conveyed to an official concerned on Monday by Sun Yanfeng, military, naval and air attache of the Chinese embassy here who is doyen of the corps.

articles.title: Foreign Guests Visit War Museum
articles.content:
Foreign Guests Visit War Museum
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- The economic and commercial councilors corps here visited the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum on Monday on the occasion of the 57th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The visitors went round the data and exhibits on display at the museum, being briefed on the fact that the army and people of the DPRK repelled the armed invasion by the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces and won a shining victory under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung, invincible and iron-willed commander and great strategist.

articles.title: Meeting with Heroes Held
articles.content:
Meeting with Heroes Held
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- A meeting between heroes and women's union members took place here on Monday on the occasion of the 57th anniversary of the victorious Fatherland Liberation War.
					 DPRK Hero Kim Sung Un, a lecturer of the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, recalled at the meeting that President Kim Il Sung initiated the movement of aircraft-hunting teams and wisely led it to frustrate the enemies' numerical and technical superiority.
					
					 Labor Hero Jon Ku Gang, a lecturer of the museum, referred to the fact that army surgeons had displayed the matchless self-sacrificing spirit and devotion during the hard-fought war.
					
					 While hearing their talk, members of the women's union cherished once again the greatness of Kim Il Sung, the prominent strategist and ever-victorious iron-willed commander, and the merits of the brave men of the People's Army who devoted their all to the sacred war of justice for defending the freedom and independence of the country and the achievements of the revolution.
					
					 They stressed that the exploits performed by the President for the victory in the war serve as the banner encouraging the army and people of the DPRK to always emerge victorious in the showdown with the U.S. and the noble spirit of the former generations who unhesitatingly dedicated their youth and lives to the struggle for the party and the leader and the country has been carried forward steadfastly.

articles.title: Art Performances Given by Art Squads of Mills
articles.content:
Art Performances Given by Art Squads of Mills
Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- The art squad of the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Silk Mill and the itinerant art squad of the Pyongyang Textile Mill gave their art performances at the People's Palace of Culture from July 21 to 25.
					 The performances were enjoyed by officials of party and power organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, servicepersons and working people from all walks of life in the city of Pyongyang.
					
					 In such numbers as chorus "The General Is Our Father", dialogic poem "We Sing of the Loving Care Shown by the Three Commanders of Mt. Paektu", female chorus and pangchang "Recollecting the Birthplace" the performers highly sang of the immortal feats of the great persons of Mt. Paektu who put forward the working class as the driving forces of the revolution and led them to become performers of heroic feats.
					
					 Tale and singing "My Beloved Workplace", female chorus "Oriole Chirps in Compound of Our Mill", female solo and Janggu ensemble "Let's Go to Pick Mulberry Leaves" and witty talk "Hot Wind of Emulation" struck a deep impression on the audience as they truthfully represented the devoted efforts of the working people and their worthwhile life.
					
					 Put on the stage were also numbers reflecting the faith and will of the workers to uphold the party and the leader with victory in the drive for great surge.

articles.title: Creators and Artistes of Phibada Opera Troupe Welcomed
articles.content:
Creators and Artistes of Phibada Opera Troupe Welcomed
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held at Pyongyang Kim Won Gyun Conservatory Monday to welcome creators and artistes of the Phibada Opera Troupe who returned home after successfully winding up their performance of the opera "A Dream of Red Mansions" in China.
					 Present there were An Tong Chun, minister of Culture, officials concerned, creators and artistes in the city. 
					
					 Participants in the meeting warmly congratulated the principal creators and artistes on their successful presentation of the opera with garlands and bouquets.  
					
					Song Sok Hwan, vice-minister of Culture, said in his speech that the opera "A Dream of Red Mansions" could be successfully staged as the beautiful flower of friendship between the DPRK and China thanks to General Secretary Kim Jong Il who initiated its reproduction on the best level as required by the new century and energetically led it.
					
					 Noting that through the performance tour of China the creators and artistes keenly realized the personality of Kim Jong Il as a peerlessly great man, he stressed that they came to have the conviction that they can successfully carry out any creative task if they do as taught by him. 
					
					 Speakers at the meeting said that the theory and principle on creating operas of "Sea of Blood" style serve as a cornerstone for the development of Juche-oriented opera art and an encyclopedia for opera creation as it helps perfectly represent any world famous work. 
					
					  They expressed the resolution to make new innovation in creating opera and significantly greet the 65th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea and the WPK conference.

articles.title: Premier League Soccer Matches End
articles.content:
Premier League Soccer Matches End
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- The fourth round of the premier league soccer matches, held at Kim Il Sung Stadium in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea for some 30 days, has come to an end.
					 Participating in the matches were eleven men's and eight women's teams.
					
					 The April 25, Sobaeksu and Amnokgang teams took the first three places in the men's matches and the April 25, Amnokgang and Jebi teams in the women's matches.
					
					 Eighty-three matches (55 men's matches and 28 women's matches) took place in the latest round and 227 goals were recorded, 2.7 goals per match.
					
					 The premier league has served as a stimulus to the soccer development in the country.

articles.title: Failed "Offensives" of US Imperialists in Korean War
articles.content:
Failed "Offensives" of US Imperialists in Korean War
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- In the period of the Fatherland Liberation War (June 1950-July 1953), the U.S. imperialists resorted to every sort of desperate plots and attempts to make up for repeated defeats they suffered from the first period of the war.
					 They mobilized elite divisions which were armed with modern combat and technical equipment and well "experienced" in a number of aggression wars, and inveigled even forces of its fifteen satellite countries into the war.
					
					 They, availing themselves of their numerical and technical superiority over the Korean People's Army, launched a "summer offensive" in August 1951, but met with a setback.
					
					 Later, they staged an "autumn offensive", called "command operation", but it was also doomed to failure, confronted by a heroic fight of the KPA.
					
					 After failing in ensuing attempts such as "suffocation operation", "scorched-land operation" and "Kimhwa offensive" they prepared a new offensive, "Eisenhower Offensive", in 1953 in the hope of retrieving themselves from a series of defeats. 
					
					As part of the offensive, they organized a battle on Jonghyong Hill as a "model battle" by mobilizing forces much more than defensive forces of the KPA.
					
					 Their failure to occupy the hill, however, augured the ruin of the offensive.
					
					 The same held true for other offensives they unleashed afterward.

articles.title: US-S. Korea Joint Naval Maneuvers Blasted
articles.content:
US-S. Korea Joint Naval Maneuvers Blasted
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet group at last kicked off anti-DPRK joint naval maneuvers together with the U.S. imperialists under the pretext of "defending" it from somebody's "provocation", but this is no more than a deceptive farce which can convince nobody, Rodong Sinmun says in a signed article Monday.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The group described the DPRK-targeted saber-rattling as "defensive" even though it is getting hell-bent on the racket for confrontation and war against its fellow countrymen in collusion with the U.S. imperialists. This is nothing but rigmarole to cover up the danger of the joint maneuvers, which may render the situation in the Korean Peninsula and its surrounding areas extremely tense and lead it to the brink of war, and justify its frantic anti-DPRK war provocation moves.
					
					 The saber-rattling is a prelude to the second Korean War, to all intents and purposes.
					
					 What should not go unnoticed here is the danger of the joint exercises now underway in the East Sea of Korea by the U.S. and south Korean warmongers with huge armed forces involved. They are military exercises in word but, in fact, a three-dimensional test war for mounting an all-out attack on the DPRK.
					
					 The puppet forces plan to stage at least 10 joint military exercises with the U.S. one after another till the end of this year, including Ulji Freedom Guardian and anti-submarine exercises in the wake of the on-going joint naval maneuvers.
					
					 The reality goes to clearly prove that the warlike forces at home and abroad made it a fait accompli to provoke the second Korean War and they can launch the war of aggression against the DPRK any time.
					
					 It is quite natural that the domestic and foreign public opinions strongly urge the U.S. and the south Korean authorities to stop the joint naval maneuvers, vehemently denouncing them for bringing dark clouds of a nuclear war to hang over the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 They will have to pay a dear price if they persist in the criminal act of harassing peace and security on the peninsula, defying our repeated warnings and turning a deaf ear to the domestic and foreign demand for the settlement of outstanding issues of the peninsula in a peaceful way through direct talks and negotiations.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Authorities' Fascist Suppression Blasted
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Authorities' Fascist Suppression Blasted
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- The puppet authorities are kicking up a wholesale racket of suppression of the progressive and democratic forces after the "elections to the local self-governing bodies" in south Korea. This is a revelation of an extreme crisis and a blatant challenge to the people's desire for independence, democracy and reunification.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday says this in a signed article.
					
					 The article goes on:
					
					 It is a trite method of the south Korean dictators forsaken by the people to resort to fascist crackdown whenever they find themselves in a ruling crisis.
					
					 Very clear is the aim sought by the south Korean conservative group through its fascist actions. Through them it seeks to take revenge upon the progressive and democratic forces for its defeat in the "elections to the local self-governing bodies" and eliminate all the political rivals opposed to its treacherous policies by brandishing fascist truncheons. By doing so this group wants to beat the progressive and democratic forces in the forthcoming "by-election to the National Assembly" and spend the latter half of its office with ease.
					
					 Due to the conservative group's rampage south Korea's colonial dependency has increased, democracy and human rights are mercilessly trampled down and the inter-Korean relations brought to a total collapse. The progressive and democratic forces in south Korea have waged actions against the group of traitors' intolerable acts of treachery. The fascist actions being perpetrated against these forces are criminal acts that can be committed only by the enemies of the people as they are dead-set against independence, democracy and reunification.
					
					 It is quite natural that the traitors to the nation can never command the support of the people but are bound to be thrown into a dumping ground of history for their crimes.
					
					 The south Korean authorities would be well advised to honestly apologize for their monstrous crimes before the nation and make a switchover in their treacherous policies as demanded by the south Korean people, drawing a due lesson from the disgrace they suffered in the international arena and all their domestic policy failures, if they are able to judge the trend of the times.

articles.title: Japan Accused of Attempting to Block Resumption of Six-party Talks
articles.content:
Japan Accused of Attempting to Block Resumption of Six-party Talks 
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- Japanese Foreign Minister Okada at a recent press conference let loose impertinent remarks, uttering this or that about the "Cheonan" case, a plot.  He jabbered that "it is difficult to expect an early resumption of the six-party talks" and "it depends on the attitude" of the DPRK.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday says in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 This was nothing but rhetoric let loose by Okada, prompted by Japan's dastardly and sinister plot to derail the six-party talks at any cost in a bid to block the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula and fish in troubled waters. 
					
					 Japan is still making much fuss about the "Cheonan" case imprudently though it has no justification to meddle in the matter. This is no more than disgraceful behavior of a servant of the U.S. to please his master. 
					
					 The six-party talks are not such type of talks which are conducted at the beck and call of Japan. They do not require any interference from it and they are sure to be resumed if there are mature conditions for them. Their resumption depends on those necessary conditions. 
					
					 The whole process of the six-party talks goes to prove that Japan was nothing but a trouble-maker and a bete-noire at the talks.
					
					  Japan would be well advised to mind its unstable and tumultuous society in stead of conducting hectic diplomacy as it has neither qualification nor face to participate in the six-party talks. 
					
					 The situation in Japan now remains unstable and political quake is looming there. It is, therefore, ridiculous for Japan to make such absurd efforts to block the resumption of the six-party talks, turning its face away from its domestic affairs.
					
					 There is nothing for Japan to do at the six-party talks. It had better properly know where it stands and stop poking its nose into irrelevant matters.

articles.title: Anniversary of Victory in Fatherland Liberation War Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Victory in Fatherland Liberation War Observed 
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- July 27 means the day of the second liberation for the army and people of the DPRK as they defeated the U.S. imperialists and honorably protected the sovereignty of the country under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung. It is, at the same time, the day of glory that makes the generations to come cherish the precious legacy of victory to be glorified by them, always remembering it. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday says this in a by-lined article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The above-said victory constitutes a shining victory won thanks to the outstanding military idea, strategy and tactics and extraordinary commanding art of the President, the founder of the Songun idea and the pioneer of the revolutionary cause of Songun. It is a signal victory won thanks to the heroic struggle of the Korean People's Army, the heir to the Songun traditions established in the period of the anti-Japanese struggle, and the army-people unity attained on the road of Songun.
					
					 Recalling that the Korean people have won one victory after another with the might of Songun in the stand-off with the U.S. imperialists for more than half a century since the ceasefire of the Korean War, the article notes that this was attributable to the outstanding Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 This leadership finds its manifestation in the fact that he equipped all the servicepersons and people with the Juche-based view on a war and turned the whole country into an impregnable fortress in view of the situation where the state of cease-fire persisted. His leadership proved to be an immortal one as he decisively smashed the persistent war moves of the U.S. imperialists and fully demonstrated the sovereignty of the country and the dignity of the nation before the world and brilliant one as he wrote a heroic epic of creation and change, prevailing over imperialism in all fields including politics, diplomacy, economy and culture. 
					
					 It was thanks to Songun that the army and people of the DPRK could frustrate the ideological and cultural poisoning and psychological warfare perpetrated by the imperialists against them through the revolutionary ideological offensive and foil the imperialists' sanctions against the DPRK by dint of the army-people unity and self-reliance and dash ahead like the wind towards a thriving nation.
					
					 The drive for building a thriving nation in the DPRK is one to build a great power having invincible national power in all fields including politics, military affairs, economy and culture. It is like a final do-or-die battle for finally shattering the moves of the U.S. imperialists for a war of aggression.
					
					 It is possible to win a victory in the final do-or-die battle with imperialism only when a strong country with invincible national power emerges as early as possible not only in the political and military fields but in the economic field. 
					
					 It is necessary to bring about great innovations and leap forward in all sites for building a thriving nation under the banner of Songun in order to win the final victory in the Songun revolution. The day of victory like July 27 will always be in store for the Korean people following the road of Songun.

articles.title: Joint Military Exercises to Be Staged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Joint Military Exercises to Be Staged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet warmongers announced that they would stage Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises from August 16 to 26, according to south Korea's Yonhap News.
					 They, caught by war fever, scheme to hurl into the forthcoming exercises more huge armed forces than the preceding exercises, asserting that the exercises are "part of the counteractions to the north's attack on warship 'Cheonan'" and they are intended to "increase the alliance capacity."
					
					UFG has been so far conducted under the baton of the south Korean puppet army, with more than 10,000 effectives of the U.S. forces involved.
					
					But the forthcoming exercises will be staged under the baton of the south Korea-U.S. "Combined Forces Command", with at least 30,000 U.S. troops stationed in south Korea and overseas and a large number of south Korean puppet troops involved.
					
					 The warmongers already launched the frantic joint naval exercises in the East Sea of Korea under the pretext of the case of sunk warship "Cheonan" and are going to stage another exercises aimed at invasion of the DPRK. Such military provocations evidently show what was the real intention sought by the U.S. and the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors in cooking up the anti-DPRK conspiratorial case.

articles.title: Repression of Pro-reunification Organization in S. Korea
articles.content:
Repression of Pro-reunification Organization in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- The puppet Supreme Court of south Korea on July 23 sentenced to prison terms Kim Song Il, a member of the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration, according to south Korean CBS.
					 The puppet group gave him a two-year jail sentence by accepting the judgment made at the second trial after branding his activity at the above-said solidarity as "enemy-benefiting".
					
					 It also made the decision on defining the solidarity as an "enemy-benefiting organization", asserting that the solidarity's activity is in fact aimed at praising and encouraging the north's activities or sympathizing with them though it outwardly works as a nongovernmental body.

articles.title: DPRK's Stand to Defend National Sovereignty Supported
articles.content:
DPRK's Stand to Defend National Sovereignty Supported
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- The National Guidance Council of the Pioneer Party of Indonesia and the Indonesia-Korea Association for Friendship and Cultural Exchange released a joint statement on July 21 to mark the 57th anniversary of the victorious Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Saying that the last Fatherland Liberation War was a just war on the part of the Korean people to defend the dignity and sovereignty of the country and nation from the aggression by the U.S., the statement stressed that the Korean people won a brilliant victory in the war under the wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 It charged that forgetful of the lesson from the Korean War, the U.S. is rendering the situation of the Korean Peninsula extremely tense while engaging itself in all sorts of provocations including joint military maneuvers against the DPRK.
					
					 Expressing deep apprehension over the joint naval exercises recently launched by the south Korean authorities with the U.S., the statement extended full support and solidarity to the DPRK's principled stand to defend the sovereignty of the country and nation and ensure peace in the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 It bitterly condemned the U.S. and the south Korean authorities for committing provocations to steadily escalate the tension in the peninsula and urged them to immediately halt to every action that may bring great calamities to the Korean nation.
					
					 Meanwhile, Torstein Engelskjon, chairman of the Friendship Society Norway-Korea, issued a statement on July 20 on the same occasion.

articles.title: Acto central por 57o aniversario de la victoria en la guerra coreana
articles.content:
Acto central por 57o aniversario de la victoria en la guerra coreana
Pyongyang, 26 de julio (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 26 en el Palacio de Deportes de Pyongyang el acto central por el 57o aniversario de la victoria del pueblo coreano en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria.
					Al acto asistieron los cuadros del partido, el ejercito y el Estado, el presidente de partido amigo, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, organizaciones de masas, ministerios y organos centrales, oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito del Interior Popular de Corea, funcionarios de las ramas de ciencia, educacion, cultura y arte, salud publica, prensa e informacion, veteranos de la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria, heroes, familiares de los uniformados del EPC, benemeritos de rasgos hermosos de ayuda al ejercito, compatriotas en ultramar de visita en la Patria socialista y el representante de la Sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang.
					
					El 27 de julio del 42 (1953) de la Era Juche es el dia de la victoria que bajo la sabia direccion del Presidente Kim Il Sung, el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea lograron al vencer a los imperialistas yanquis en la enconada Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria de 3 anos.
					
					En esta contienda, ellos defendieron la independencia de la patria y la soberania de la nacion desde la agresion de las fuerzas aliadas imperialistas y abrieron la pendiente por la cual comenzarian a rodar los imperialistas yanquis al hacer anicos el mito de ellos que se jactaban de la "supremacia" en el mundo.
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo del vicemariscal del EPC Kim Yong Chun, vicepresidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, quien dijo en particular:
					
					La victoria en la pasada guerra coreana fue el milagro de la historia de la guerra contemporanea logrado por la autoctona idea militar y metodos de combate, la audacia sin igual y la extraordinaria arte de mando militar del Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					
					Bajo la destacada direccion del Presidente, el pueblo coreano obtuvo el brillante triunfo en la guerra de liberacion de la patria, defendio honrosamente la gloriosa Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y las conquistas de la revolucion y preservo la seguridad y la paz de la humanidad frustrando las maquinaciones de los imperialistas yanquis para provocar nueva guerra mundial.
					
					Las inmortales hazanas de victoria en la guerra realizadas por el Presidente y las invencibles tradiciones de Corea heroica siguen firmemente de siglo en siglo gracias a la sabia direccion del Comandante Supremo Kim Jong Il sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun.
					
					A base del analisis cientifico de las circunstancias internacionales en que se hallaba la revolucion coreana y de la tendencia de situacion bruscamente cambiada en el periodo cuando la patria y la nacion sufrian arduas dificultades, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il establecio integralmente en la nueva etapa mas alta la politica de Songun que da prioridad a los asuntos militares y toma por el grueso a las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias y aseguro la firme garantia politico-militar para la victoria final del combate de enfrentamiento antiyanqui.
					
					La gran victoria lograda en esta batalla probo fehacientemente que son eternas la invencible historia y las tradiciones del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea que tienen a la cabeza de la revolucion del Songun al ilustre Comandante sin par, Kim Jong Il, y que ninguna fuerza puede vencer el poderio de la unidad monolitica de Corea en torno al Dirigente.
					
					EE.UU. debe darse clara cuenta de que detras del "25 de junio" de la guerra agresiva desatada por si mismo, hay "el 27 de julio" de victoria de Corea del Songun.
					
					La RPDC fortalecera mas su disuasivo nuclear con el metodo nuevamente desarrollado frente a la persistente amenaza nuclear de EE.UU.
					
					Esto es el justo derecho independiente de la RPDC y la contramedida implacable de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias que salen siempre victoriosas aniquilando a los enemigos con la audacia y el espiritu de ataque del Paektu.
					
					Si los yanquis y la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak desencadenan, por fin, en esta tierra la nueva guerra agresiva a pesar de repetidas advertencias de la RPDC, esta reducira a cenizas a todos los agresores y sus bases principales movilizando todas potencialidades militares incluido el disuasivo nuclear autodefensivo, demostrara claramente a los enemigos que es la verdadera guerra y eliminara por completo la causa raigal de la guerra.

articles.title: RPDC se esforzara por la amistad con paises de ASEAN
articles.content:
RPDC se esforzara por la amistad con paises de ASEAN
Pyongyang, 26 de julio (ATCC) -- El canciller Pak Ui Chun, jefe de la delegacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, hizo uso de la palabra el dia 23 en la reunion ministerial del XVII Foro Regional de ASEAN celebrado en Vietnam.
					Pak se refirio a que ASEAN emprendio su primer paso significativo en la trayectoria de la construccion de la comunidad para 2015 y la ejecucion de su carta y expreso su deseo de que esta organizacion hara gran aporte a la paz y el desarrollo de Asia y el resto del mundo siendo una fuerza de paz, la de desarrollo mas influyente.
					
					La situacion de la Peninsula Coreana, que en estos dias llega al borde de la guerra, no solo ha creado un peligro serio a la soberania de la RPDC y la seguridad del pueblo coreano sino que tambien obstaculiza gravemente la construccion de la potencia economica de Corea, senalo el orador y continuo:
					
					Hasta la fecha, ha venido manteniendose la paz en la Peninsula Coreana, lo cual se debe a la profunda atencion e ingentes esfuerzos de ASEAN.
					
					Por inmediato, el gobierno de la RPDC se esforzara por realizar la concertacion del acuerdo de la paz y la desnuclearizacion mediante las imparciales conversaciones a 6 bandas.
					
					Opinamos que los esfuerzos por la reanudacion de las equitativas conversaciones a 6 bandas, la concertacion del acuerdo de la paz y la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana son el rumbo mas correcto de la observacion de la paz y la seguridad de Asia, que conviene al ideal de ASEAN y el proposito del Foro Regional.
					
					Estamos convencidos de que los paises miembros del foro apoyaran y estimularan la reanudacion inmediata de la imparcial cita a 6 bandas teniendo la correcta compresion sobre los esfuerzos de la RPDC por resolver el problema de origen: la guerra o la paz en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Tambien en el futuro, el gobierno de la RPDC fortalecera y desarrollara las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion con los paises de la region bajo el ideal de politica exterior de la independencia, la paz y la amistad y cumplira con toda su responsabilidad para preservar la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana y la region.

articles.title: Minju Joson advierte a los belicistas yanquis y surcoreanos
articles.content:
Minju Joson advierte a los belicistas yanquis y surcoreanos
Pyongyang, 26 de julio (ATCC) -- Los belicistas de Estados Unidos y el Sur de Corea anunciaron que desarrollaran del dia 25 al 28 del mes en curso el ejercicio conjunto maritimo, del 16 al 26 de agosto, el ejercicio conjunto "Ulji Focus Guardian" y el otro conjunto antisubmarinos y hasta septiembre diversos ejercicios maritimos conjuntos.
					EE.UU. moviliza alli mas de 20 buques de guerra incluido el portaaviones nuclear George Washington y mas de 200 cazas de diversos generos incluido el F-22 Raptor.
					
					Los maniacos de guerra de EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea tratan de provocar la guerra nuclear de agresion a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea si se crea una oportunidad al cabo de librar durante unos meses en los Mares Este y Oeste de Corea tales ejercicios belicos bajo la participacion de enormes fuerzas so pretexto del caso de hundimiento del buque de guerra "Cheonan".
					
					Asi senala el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual difundido el dia 25 y continua:
					
					Tales ejercicios de guerra nuclear contra la RPDC sin precedentes en la historia son la abierta provocacion militar anti-RPDC y, al mismo tiempo, burla e insulto a la ONU y la sociedad internacional.
					
					Tambien, muestran que no son cambiadas la politica hostil de EE.UU. tendente a aplastar con las fuerzas armadas a la RPDC y la intencion de la banda de traidores surcoreanos de perjudicar a los connacionales apoyandose en las fuerzas foraneas, y se tornan cada dia mas abiertas.
					
					Es vana tal intencion de aplastar con el arma a la RPDC.
					
					Tambien, la RPDC tiene las fuerzas armadas.
					
					Como ya conoce todo el mundo, el Ejercito Popular de Corea es invencible con el disuasivo nuclear.
					
					Como ya declaro el portavoz del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC, el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea se enfrentaran con tal disuasivo nuclear a los ejercicios de guerra nuclear de los imperialistas norteamericanos y los titeres surcoreanos e iniciaran en cualquier momento la sagrada guerra de represalia al estilo coreano.
					
					La RPDC no pronuncio ninguna vez palabras vanas.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun critica a Japon que impide conversaciones a 6 bandas
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun critica a Japon que impide conversaciones a 6 bandas
Pyongyang, 26 de julio (ATCC) -- En una rueda de prensa sostenida hace poco, so pretexto del intrigante caso de hundimiento del buque de guerra surcoreano "Cheonan", el canciller japones Okada dijo que "es dificil reanudar pronto" las conversaciones a 6 bandas, "depende de la actitud de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea", etc.
					Esto no pasa de ser una vil artimana de Japon de frustrar de un modo u otro la cita a 6 bandas para impedir de todas maneras la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana y ganar provecho.
					
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual difundido el dia 26 y continua:
					
					Japon, que no tiene ninguna calificacion en la solucion del problema, arma alborotos con el caso del "Cheonan", lo cual no pasa de ser una conducta grosera de sirviente que obedece a EE.UU.
					
					Reiniciar las conversaciones a 6 bandas no depende de Japon sino de las condiciones favorables y el tiempo adecuado.
					
					Al tomar en consideracion todo el proceso de la cita a seis bandas, Japon fue ente inutil.
					
					Para este pais isleno que no tiene ninguna calificacion de participar en esta cita, sera bueno atender a sus asuntos criollos.
					
					Japon no tiene nada que hacer en las conversaciones a seis partes. Debe conocer correctamente su situacion y actuar con prudencia.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena ejercicios maritimos Sur de Corea-EE.UU.
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena ejercicios maritimos Sur de Corea-EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 26 de julio (ATCC) -- Los titeres surcoreanos iniciaron por fin con los imperialistas norteamericanos el ejercicio conjunto maritimo contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea bajo la mascara de "ejercicios defensivos" frente a la "provocacion" de alguien.
					Pero, esto es un acto enganoso inaceptable a nadie.
					
					Asi revela el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual de este lunes y prosigue:
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos, que arman desesperadamente la campana de confrontacion y guerra contra los connacionales en contubernio con los imperialistas yanquis, lo describen como la "defensa", lo cual no pasa de ser intriga encaminada a encubrir la peligrosidad del presente simulacro, que agravara al maximo la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana y su contorno y la llevara a borde de la guerra, y a justificar sus maniobras de provocacion de agresion a la RPDC.
					
					  Tales ejercicios conjuntos maritimos Sur de Corea-EE.UU. son preludio de la provocacion de la segunda guerra coreana.
					
					  Este simulacro, que los imperialistas norteamericanos y los belicistas titeres surcoreanos realizan en el Mar Este de Corea introduciendo las colosales fuerzas armadas, tiene la peligrosidad intolerable, porque devienen de hecho un entrenamiento practico tridimensional y una guerra de ensayo para atacar a la RPDC.
					
					  Ademas, los titeres surcoreanos planean librar de continuo mas de 10 veces hasta el fin de este ano los simulacros, entre ellos, el ejercicio militar conjunto "Ulji Freedom Guardian" y el entrenamiento conjunto antisubmarinos.
					
					  Tales circunstancias demuestran que las fuerzas belicistas internas y externas consideran la provocacion de la segunda guerra coreana como hecho consumado y que el estallido de la guerra de agresion a la RPDC por parte de ellas es cuestion de tiempo.
					
					  Ahora la opinion publica interna y externa denuncia severamente a EE.UU. y las autoridades surcoreanas que acarrean el nubarron de guerra a la Peninsula Coreana y demanda fuertemente el cese de los ejercicios conjuntos maritimos, lo cual es muy logico.
					
					  Ellos pagaran el precio caro si siguen recurriendo persistentemente a los actos criminales que destruyen la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana sin prestar atencion a la reiterada advertencia de la RPDC y a la demanda de la opinion publica interna y externa de resolver por via pacifica a traves del dialogo directo y negociaciones los problemas pendientes de esta peninsula.
